3.1 JDT Debug Change Notes

This document describes important changes in the 3.1 JDT debugger, relative to the 3.0 release.

New Features

1.5 Support

Generic signatures, isEnum, isVarArgs

Locks & Monitors

IJavaObject and utils JavaDebugUtils.

Default VM agruments & Java version (IVMInstall)

JavaLaunchDelegate

TODO: New API class to subclass

Native classpath entries

Java doc location per JRE library

Translate runtimeclasspath entries to source containers (JavaRuntime)

API Changes
